channel.title: Neuralink on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Neuralink on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: OpenAI, cofounder Sam Altman to take on Neuralink with new startup
item.description: Sam Altman says we could soon have “high-bandwidth brain-computer interfaces.”

item.title: The Very Real Case for Brain-Computer Implants
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we dive into the heated race between two companies to build a commercial brain-computer interface.
